runs.comm: nice straight drive to begin with, half volley and he beats Praveen Kumar's reach, two fielders chase
slides it wide down the leg side and wide called
gets across and softly punches it on the front foot, Kallis must still be jet-lagged
half volley outside the off stump and Levi gets across and scoops it over mid-off, looking dangerous already
Praveen paying for width there, gets on his knee and slices that past backward point, good timing on that one
that's a very good comeback, the inswinger honing in on the base of the off stump and he jams it back to the bowler
drifts it inwards and Kallis tucks it to the leg side for a single
that was a swat, good length on the off stump and he thumps it down the ground wide of mid-off
another front-foot swat but this time down the on side, picks it from outside off and forces it wide of midwicket
edged! Irfan gets the ball to land on the off stump channel, Levi gets forward and tries to push it to the off side but gets an outside edge to first slip
quite stylish! Ingram goes back to a length delivery and punches it wide of backward point, timed perfectly
slides it wide down the leg side
moves away from the left-hander and he leaves it alone
stays beside the line and angles it down to third man
angles it across the left-hander and he leaves it alone
excellent delivery! This one nips back inwards and squares him up, close to the off stump, nearly takes the edge
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
nearly gave it away there, again he gets good bounce and Ingram picked the wrong ball to steer to third man
tucked towards mid-on and they have to scamper the single
good length outside off and steered to third man
strays on the pads and he works it to the leg side
gets a top edge as he tries to clear mid-on but he gets enough to beat the fielder, close call for Ingram
tries to run that down to third man and he misses it, he's done that already
shot of the day so far, he comes down the pitch, sees it's a length ball and sweetly punches it wide of cover, good adjustment in the end
beats him outside the off stump, he's done a lot to try and give his wicket away
angles on the pads and he clips it to midwicket
top shot from Kallis! Comes down the track and smacks a length ball down to sweeper cover, similar to the one Ingram played earlier
swings away and he wafts at it and misses
he whips it away down to deep midwicket, he has some protection there
bangs it in short and he tries to hook but gets a top edge that lands safely in front of fine leg
just gets enough on it! Kallis stays at the crease and swings across the line and only just clears mid-on who leaps
gets down on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
deftly dabbed down to third man, he saw there was no slip
stays back and clips it to mid-on
comes down the track and Ashwin fires it on the pads, Ingram was squared up and could only pad it away
forceful sweep, in the air for a long time and the keeper yelled 'catch', enough on  it to beat the diving deep square leg fielder
hits him on the pads but down the leg side
strays on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
not short enough to pull but he manages to place it along the ground to deep square leg
driven firmly off the front foot and Kohli runs across at sweeper cover
drifts on the pads and he works it to the leg side
the first of many full tosses? Ingram fetches that from the off stump and clubs it over midwicket
on the pads and he works it to the onside
tries to nudge it away but the ball clips his pads and dribbles to the on side
works it to the leg side
bowls it flat and Kallis fails to work it away
more than a few rows back! Yusuf tosses it up and Kallis takes a few paces forward and lofts over long-on
works it softly to the leg side
on the pads and clipped to the leg side
pushed through on the pads and he works it to the on side
opens the face and steers it to the off side
tosses it up wide outside off and he slams it to sweeper cover
nurdles it to the off side for a quick single
punches it straight to cover
tossed up on the pads and he works it to midwicket
chops it towards cover and they steal a quick single
chops it towards short third man and they think of pinching another single
driven straight back to the bowler
lofts him high over midwicket but safe
punches it solidly down to long-on
whips it down to deep square leg
power! The bowler dropped it a fraction short from round the wicket and he read the length early and swung it over deep midwicket
clips it wide of midwicket
punches it just wide of the bowler and down to long-off
clips it past the diving bowler and down to long-on
tries to sweep but fails to make contact with the bat
heads up! Drops it short and Kallis rocks back and swings it several rows back over deep midwicket
goes back and punches it to the off side
Ingram gives him the charge and improvises well, lofts with the turn over extra cover
punches it down to long-off
gets on his knee and forces it down to deep square leg
nice yorker to begin with, Ingram did well to squeeze it out
swings a length ball across the line and slams it to long-on
opens the face and cuts him to square third man
Irfan drops it short and Ingram makes room and gets a thick outside edge which sails past the vacant slips region
follows that up with a crisp cover drive to the sweeper
goes back and punches it behind square on the leg side
tossed up outside off and he drives him down to sweeper cover
Ingram gets his fifty with a punch down to long-on, he's used this occasion to make a name for himself
a fifty for the Man of the Night! Lofts down to long-on and Ashwin makes a mess of it and over-runs the ball close to the boundary
full delivery outside off and he bends his knee and crashes it over the covers, that was raw power
jet lag? What jet lag? Kallis stays back to a length delivery and punches it forcefully down to deep extra cover, he has some power in those arms
punches it to the same sweeper cover region but it's picked up
dabs it down to short third man for a quick single
Ingram was down the track and it looked as if he wouldn't clear long-on, but he did
fuller delivery and he forces it down to long-off
tossed up on middle and leg and worked to long-on
full outside off and driven down to sweeper cover
Kallis gets on his knee and tries to slog him over deep midwicket, only just failed to clear the boundary, Rohit took it very close to the rope
down the leg side and he gets his first runs in international cricket with a clip to the leg side
makes room and punches it down to the covers
flatter delivery and too close to cut, nearly edges it
goes back and punches it to sweeper cover
goes back and slogs him over midwicket
slog sweeps and the ball races towards deep midwicket and Gambhir does well to stick his hand out and parries it away
rocks back and punches it to the off side
that was a whiplash! Full pacy delivery outside off and Ingram makes room and slashes it over deep backward point, used the pace of the ball
delicately done! Vinay drifts down the leg side and Ingram moves across and gently flicks it down to fine leg
timing! Vinay gives him width and Ingram cuts it with very little effort and sends the ball scorching past third man
punches it towards mid-off and calls early
Behardian plays a shot of confidence, short of a length and he bashes that past the covers, finds the big gap in the deep
he slogs him and Rohit does really well to time his dive at deep midwicket and pluck it inches from the ground
punches it wide of Vinay at long-on
goes back and punches it to the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, he gets on his knee and slogs him cleanly over deep square leg
fullish in length outside off and he gets on his knee and drives down to sweeper cover
Irfan did nothing wrong there! It was a sharp, inswinging yorker which should have fetched him a reward but the ball snuck between the batsman's legs and raced to fine leg
swinging in and he works it to long-on for a couple
driven firmly off the front foot and Raina does well to cut it off at point
crashed! Ontong leans onto a half volley after shuffling his back leg at the crease, sends it scorching past cover
full on middle and leg and he clips it to midwicket
gets on his knee and lofts cleanly over extra cover
going, going... Ontong gets on his knee and slogs him high and far over deep midwicket
timber! Ontong attempts another slog and he misses it completely, the middle stump's knocked back
didn't take him long to warm up! Goes back at the crease and tonks a short delivery high over long-on
fires it down the leg side and Morkel helps it on its way wide of short fine leg, poor bowling
the fielder lost that completely! Morkel pulled a length delivery down to long-on and Ashwin appeared to lose that in the lights, stuck his right hand  out and the ball just carried over the rope
